Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Burdick without amendment. Without written report.

Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Cleared for White House.
Measure Signed in Senate.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 100-500.

official_title: A bill to designate the Sunderland National Salmon Station located in Sunderland, Massachusetts, as the "Richard Cronin National Salmon Station".

summary.text: Designates the Sunderland National Salmon Station located in Sunderland, Massachusetts, as the Richard Cronin National Salmon Station.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Sunderland National Salmon Station located in Sunderland, Massachusetts, as the "Richard Cronin National Salmon Station".
